column5: Does anyone have other recommendation beside Murder By Death or Clue? Looking for the oldie but goodie. They were so funny and not like the new one today. Someone also mention Gosford Park. Any comments on this one?  Murder By Death-10:35 mins.-1976 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4btjVPF76i0  Clue-2:21 mins.-1985
Murder by Death is one of my favorites!!! How can you go wrong with a stellar cast like that? Gosford Park wasn't funny to me, and rather boring.
